I debated on returning because I loved the front and I needed a shirt for a local event (I‚Äôm at least 8-9 hours from WI.) Ultimately I decided to return and just drive 40 mins or so to my nearest HD location to get a local shirt. It just seemed weird to walk around with a random location on my back.

name: Harley-Davidson Men's Orange Bar & Shield Black T-Shirt 30290591
reviews: The sleeves are really LONG and the shirt is really LONG!This isn‚Äôt a normal fitting tee shirt and I‚Äôm not being picky but it‚Äôs apparently made for a really tall person with long arms...Not my 5‚Äô9‚Äù body...I‚Äôm 200 LB and fit not fat and yes I‚Äôve always worn a extra Large tee shirt because I prefer that they fit a little more comfortable and not tight...If you get this one buy the size down from your usual size or be prepared for a long shirt with 3/4 length sleeves!I plan on washing it ASAP and throwing it in the clothes dryer to hopefully shrink it a little bit...Sad it‚Äôs not a normal size XL...I‚Äôd like my sleeves NOT touch my forearms and cover halfway down my biceps...I work out and have muscles but this shirts covers up my arms to my elbows...
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 September 2020
